/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the sky, giving a sense of scale and grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with a variety of vehicles, including cars, buses, and trucks, all parked neatly along the sides. The buildings that flank the street are predominantly white and gray, their monotone colors punctuated by occasional blue and green accents. The sky above is overcast, casting a soft, diffused light over the scene. Despite the absence of vibrant colors, the image conveys a sense of everyday life and activity in this part of the city.
